entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
